nodes.label: Attribute
nodes.description: Read a named attribute with a chosen GLSL type

nodes.label: Blend Color
nodes.description: Blend N colors using a selected blending mode (folded left-to-right)

nodes.label: Compute Pass
nodes.description: Defines a compute pass in the pipeline

nodes.label: Cross Product
nodes.description: Calculate cross product of two vectors

nodes.label: Data
nodes.description: Load or edit text data with optional JSON syntax highlighting

nodes.label: Data Parse
nodes.description: Parse input data using TypeScript snippet; outputs are dynamically generated from return type

nodes.label: Dot Product
nodes.description: Calculate dot product of two vectors

nodes.label: Downsample
nodes.description: Downsample a pass using a kernel to a target size

nodes.label: File
nodes.description: Render a pass to an output file

nodes.label: Geometry From File
nodes.description: Load geometry from an external file

nodes.label: Gaussian Blur Pass
nodes.description: Apply a Gaussian blur to an image

nodes.label: Image File
nodes.description: Embed a single image file (base64 data URL) into the scene

nodes.label: Image Texture
nodes.description: Load and sample an image texture

nodes.label: Instanced Geometry (End)
nodes.description: End an instanced-geometry zone (finalize and output geometry)

nodes.label: Instanced Geometry (Start)
nodes.description: Start an instanced-geometry zone (outputs an instanced geometry handle)

nodes.label: Kernel
nodes.description: Define a numeric kernel (width/height + row-major values)

nodes.label: Lerp
nodes.description: Linearly interpolate between A and B by T

nodes.label: Luminance
nodes.description: Compute relative luminance (0..1) from a color

nodes.label: Material From Shader
nodes.description: Convert a shader output to a renderable material

nodes.label: Clamp
nodes.description: Clamp value between min and max

nodes.label: Multiply
nodes.description: Multiply values (dynamic inputs); output type inferred from inputs

nodes.label: Pass Texture
nodes.description: Sample the output texture of an upstream pass node for use in material expressions

nodes.label: 2D Rect
nodes.description: Create a 2D rectangle geometry with optional rounded corners

nodes.label: Refract
nodes.description: Refract an incident vector about a normal using IOR (internally uses eta = 1.0 / ior)

nodes.label: Remap
nodes.description: Shape a scalar signal t using smoothstep, linear map, and IQ curve presets

nodes.label: Render Pass
nodes.description: Render a geometry with a material (PBR preset or shader-based)

nodes.label: Render Texture
nodes.description: Create a GPU render target texture (WebGPU GPUTextureFormat)

nodes.label: Screen
nodes.description: Present a pass to the default screen framebuffer

nodes.label: Set Transform
nodes.description: Set geometry transform using either a 4x4 matrix or component controls

nodes.label: Transform Geometry
nodes.description: Transform geometry using either a 4x4 matrix or component controls
